full_summary:
# Individual Affairs Branch (IAB) Contract Opportunity

**Title:** Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)
**Procurement Reference:** cb-238-74124362
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Publication Date:** October 24, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 15, 2023, at 4:00 p.m.
**Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

**Contract Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Region of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Government of Canada Trade Agreements:** None

**Contracting Entity:**

* **Name:** Indigenous Services Canada
* **Address:** 10 Wellington St., Gatineau, QC K1A 0H4, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Vanessa Demers-Lamothe
* **Email:** [vanessa.demers-lamothe@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:vanessa.demers-lamothe@sac-isc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (000) 000-0000

**Procurement Documents:**

* Obtain the Request for Proposal (RFP) document from the government's procurement website.

This [RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22996/tbips_npp_set-aside.pdf) is for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS). Pre-qualified suppliers from the TBIPS list will receive an invitation to bid. If you are a pre-qualified supplier, please review the RFP document for more information.

Note: 

*   A detailed description of the contract requirements and evaluation criteria is included in the RFP document.
*   Suppliers must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP document.
*   Only pre-qualified suppliers from the TBIPS list will be invited to bid.
*   The government will not provide any additional information or clarification beyond what is mentioned in the RFP document.
